title: League of Legends has been out for almost 7 years and the locked camera bug still exists
body:
Basically, your camera gets stuck on locked mode out of nowhere and the only thing you can do about it is either die or click around like an maniac and spam buttons until it (hopefully) unlocks. Until then, you can't look anywhere on the map besides right where your character is.

_That's okay game, I didn't want to be able to see anything anyways._

[Note: This thread is **general**ly to **discuss**[ion] bugs that have existed for years and how silly it is that they're still here, so no thanks mods I don't want my thread to be removed and to be told to post it on report a bug.]
